Description: For 3-8 players and an audience of thousands! Your phones or tablets are your controllers! The game of terrible drawings and hilariously wrong answers.
Fool your friends with your lies avoid theirs, and find the (usually outrageous) truth. "The mayor of Rabbit Hash, Kentucky is a ____." Go!
For 3-8 Players and an Audience of thousands! Your phones or tablets are your controllers! The gut-busting, say-anything, no-rules party game!

The "say anything" party game is going international! All the hilarious content from Quiplash 2, now in French, Italian, German, and Spanish! With 100 NEW prompts in each language! (And you can still play in boring old English.) Get this QUINTILINGUAL Quiplash now, and take your next party global!
The smart-ass trivia show that started it all! Hundreds of all-new twisted trivia questions and everyone's favorite host, Cookie Masterson!
The drawing game that takes all other drawing games and draws little mustaches on them. Can't draw? No Problem! It's funnier that way!
Keep the words rolling all night! Just finish the word coming toward you, like "Mail___." Mail enhancement, you say? You nailed it.
Do lobsters pee out of their heads? Did Japan vote the instant noodle the top invention of the 20th century? Or are you calling BS?
Fool your friends with your lies avoid theirs, and find the (usually outrageous) truth. "The mayor of Rabbit Hash, Kentucky is a ____." Go!
More Fibbage! Lie to your firends, aviod their lies, and spot the truth. "In Arizona, you must obtain a permit to feed ______ to pigs." Go!
Cow moo? Huge explosion? Or tiny fart? Which to choose? It's the sound effects game that will leave you up to your ears in laughter!
Outbid your opponents for absurd art-drawn by players themselves-and win this strangely competitive aution game! Don't be a bidiot!
The laugh-a-minute battle of wits and wittiness in it's HUGEST form! Come up with "the best name to give an ugly baby" and win!
Welcome to Bomb Corp. Interns of your kind must help defuse bombs in our office. It's a weird office full of bombs. Just hit start.
The say-anything party game returns. Come up with "a bad subsitute for dental floss" and win! Tired of our weird prompts? Try the new Make Your Own mode!
Be the last to survive a serial killer's absurd trivia game show. But it's fun!
What percentage of people have buried something in the woods? Ridden in the back of a cop car? Have a crush on someone they work with? Guess right and win!
Everyone gives an answer, but not everyone knows the question. One of your friends has something to hide. Find the faker before it's too late!
Draw pictures, write slogans, then swap them around to create your own custome t-shirt warriors. Only the most worthy novelty t-shirt will leave the tournament alive.
Fib your way through all-new question types and the all-newer game mode Fibbage: Enough About You. Guess the weird facts about your fellow players!
Log on and strap in! It's survival of the funniest as you playfully take your friends out of context across the World Wide Web.
A dating-themed game where you send funny messages and try to hide your secret monster powers. Just like real dating!
The deranged debate tournament! "What's the best vegetable for Benedict Cumberbatch to voice in the movie?" Place smart bets on what will win stupid arguments.
You've been hired to create murals all over Doodle Valley. Compete to see who can make the best additions in your attempt to "beautify" the city.
